item.title: Hacking the Success Code: 6 Habits Every Penetration Tester Must Have
item.description: After have working professionally in cyber security as a penetration tester for half a decade (hacking scene for 10+), I feel I have learned a few things on how to improve your skill set, way of working and communicating with customers. I have also had the opportunity to work with some great people in cyber security from which I have learned considerably from. In this article, I will present six habits which I believe represent a strong penetration tester.
